content.body: Can't anyone answer questions about HTML?
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Can't anyone answer questions about HTML?

content.body: Alex.hsu: heya, I think your question is probably not specific enough and doesn't really relate to WHATWG standards. Might be better suited for Stack Overflow or some such.

content.body:
annevk: 
I think this question is about canonical unification of HTML
Because in different Androids, the functions of simple HTML input are different, and different situations will occur
This raises doubts about unity
myquestion:
https://github.com/mdn/browser-compat-data/issues/15096

content.body: Alex.hsu: rendering of form controls depends on platform and locale, so that seems somewhat expected. In any event, I would ask about this in some Android developer forum
